Some people tell that TF2 is dead with the new updates. You know what, they are really wrong. Gameplay has almost never been changed. Only the Competitive mode added. I agree that "Competitive Mode"s bad, but you can play Casual Mode and have fun! -2017

Edit (14 December 2019): I am still completely behind my idea about how much I love this game, and how there's still some audience. But the lack of updates and ESPECIALLY the cheating issue is off the edge. Fix the game, Valve! :(

Team Fortress 2 is, in a nutshell, a team-based FPS in which the Red and Blue team compete against each other with 9 different classes in various game modes.

PROS:
+ Free to play 
+ Many maps, gamemodes and tons and tons of weaponry and cosmetics, both official and community-made
+ Very beginner-friendly. Unlike games like CS:GO, new players have a very fair chance of beating even experienced players
+ You will get weekly drops of weapons (sometimes cosmetics too)
+ A huge interest in trading items via a network of trading servers and sites. Skilled traders can make profit in the form of real money as well
+ Tons of alternate gamemode servers like x10, randomizer, medieval, deathruns, surfing, jumping, trading, tons of workshop maps, etc.  
+ It depends if you consider this as a pro, but there's explosivejumping. It's so incredibly fun and there's over 500 downloadable jumpmaps and an active community behind it. At least a fifth of my hours in this game are spent on explosivejumping
+ TF2 uses the Source engine, a very comfortable engine and very easy to configure and save settings with 
+ Trading cards 

CONS: 
- The community can be kind of toxic and/or cringy at times
- Valve keeps adding more and more updates people generally don't enjoy 
- If you play TF2 now, you'll play with a lot of weapons that used to be different (usually better) in the past. Occasionally weapons get re-balanced and often break because of it

Ever wondered why people who play Valve games have so many hours in their games? Because most Valve games are solid and super enjoyable games that withstand the test of time; they're always classic and fun. Team Fortress 2 has been around for over a decade and yet its popularity is still up there with other top selling games.
I've played this game for years, mainly because it's such a casual game in which you can hop on nearly any server and just play without any sort of startup or gathering of resources required beforehand. Same goes for quitting said server.
This is a game you keep on getting back at. It's too brilliant not to play, in all honesty.

P.S. Just a tip, play on community servers. I've never played matchmaking or competitive because it's just boring compared to the fun you'll get on various casual servers. Play it vanilla.

After upwards of 700 hours on med alone, some competitive experience, more than $4,000 of purchases, and the formation of a moderately sized group, I can confidently say that this game is a whole lot of fun.

It's basically digital Barbies, but they kill each other.

It's not balanced and makes you want to pull your hair out, but at the same time, it's the best time I've ever had online, which includes my time in incognito mode of Google Chrome.

When they say it's free, they're lying. Eventually you'll be like me, a pay to play butthole who thinks their hat makes them good. It's true, by the way. The hat makes the player.

Overall, a very good game. I would recommend it to anyone. Despite typically disliking younger players, it's not a bad choice for your first shooter. It's got a nice competitive scene if you're experienced.

Digital Barbies. But they kill each other.

Team fortress 2, in my opinion, is one of the best free to play FPS i've seen. It has funny characters with distict personalities, a great class selection, a fun selection of unlockable weapons for people who want to play the game for free, and fluid gameplay to back it up, and the graphics aren't to bad. Even after the meet your match update, it is still populated to this date for casual and competitive. The game is far from perfect though, sometimes you get to much and have to buy backpack expanders, some weapons are pretty bad like the rocket jumper that does no damage and is only used to practice rocket jumping and market gardening, and the meet your match update caused the casual to have limitaions. Even with all that, I believe that it's still a great game and recommend it to all fps lovers.

Único jogo fps que realmente se diferenciou dos outros, enquanto todos os outros seu único objetivo e "matar mais com uma arma mais eficiente" nesse você pode simplesmente mestrar uma classe e usar sua "especialidade" da melhor maneira. Por exemplo, aprender o tempo certo de refletir um foguete ou flecha, ou mesmo aprender a dar rocket/stick jump e se movimentar absurdamente mais rapido.
Worth the weight. Thanks, I had fun.

This was my first multiplayer game I ever played on Steam, and it remains one of the best ways to get started on Steam or into shooters in general. Although the fanbase is starting to die out a bit with Overwatch still topping charts, this game is still a great time. Also, it's free. Even though I will admit I don't play the game anymore, it's still such a great way to start out the adventure on Steam

Bardzo dobra gra stworzona przez Valve i wydana w 2007r.
Free to play w której mamy pakiet wielu rozgywek jak np król wzgórza czy przejmowanie punktów oraz moc ubierania swoich postaci w czapeczki i inne stroje.

Gra jest sama w sobie bardzo ciekawa i bardzo zabawna.
W ów produkcji dzięki rozbudowanej społeczności mamy bardzo, ale to bardzo ciekawe serwery w których są różne eventy i okazje do zabawy ze znajomymi.
W grze mamy wiele broni które możemy przystosować do siebie zależnie od trybu gry bądź sylu jakim chcemy grać.
Grafika gry jest bardzo kolorowa i przyjemna dla oka. Bardzo fajny jest też dodany system skinów podobny do counter strika.
W samej grze zazwyczaj nie chodzi o skilla a o dobrą zabawę i chęć rywalizacji gdy przeciwnik nas dominuje.
Także super rzeczą jest że jeżeli naprawdę się zapoznamy z wirtualnymi przedmiotami to można fajnie dogadywać i wymieniać się z innymi.

Moim zdaniem gra jest bardzo fajna jednak brakuje w niej czasami jakiś wyższych celów które np daje rozrywka rankingowa, bo samo strzelanie aby strzelać nie jest dla mnie ciekawe.
Pozdrawiam
In my opinion I would say this game contains many memories of 2014 and this game is also a big inspiration for overwatch.
